name: PopCorn 3D
short_description: PopCorn is multimedia (3d, 2d, audio, ...) engine, as a multiplatform free library to create multimedia (2d, 3d, audio) applications. It is programmed in C, high level, and is programmable as a SDL&OpenGL-like.
